# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(console LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(console "")
set_target_properties(console PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "console")
set_target_properties(console PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin")
add_dependencies(console core)
target_include_directories(console PRIVATE
    src
    src/core
    src/core/rules
)
target_include_directories(console SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/f/ftxui/v5.0.0/3fcb6b37d83343809b8bf5c2fb7c9f01/include
)
target_compile_options(console PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(console PRIVATE -W3)
else()
    target_compile_options(console PRIVATE -Wall)
endif()
set_target_properties(console PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(console PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET console PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(console PRIVATE
    ftxui-component
    ftxui-dom
    ftxui-screen
    core
    pthread
)
target_link_directories(console PRIVATE
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/f/ftxui/v5.0.0/3fcb6b37d83343809b8bf5c2fb7c9f01/lib
    build/linux/x86_64/release
)
target_link_options(console PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(console PRIVATE
    src/console/Console.cpp
    src/console/playConsole.cpp
    src/console/GameConsole.cpp
)

# target
add_library(core STATIC "")
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "core")
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(core PRIVATE
    src
    src/core
    src/core/rules
)
target_compile_options(core PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(core PRIVATE -W3)
else()
    target_compile_options(core PRIVATE -Wall)
endif()
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(core PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET core PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(core PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(core PRIVATE
    src/core/Piece.cpp
    src/core/Case.cpp
    src/core/Player.cpp
    src/core/testRegression.cpp
    src/core/Deck.cpp
    src/core/Game.cpp
    src/core/Card.cpp
    src/core/Grid.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(graphic "")
set_target_properties(graphic PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "graphic")
set_target_properties(graphic PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin")
add_dependencies(graphic graphic_files core)
target_include_directories(graphic PRIVATE
    src
    src/core
    src/core/rules
)
target_include_directories(graphic SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /usr/include/SDL2
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_ttf/2.22.0/e680bcc475114feb9516a0bcb4973171/include
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_ttf/2.22.0/e680bcc475114feb9516a0bcb4973171/include/SDL2
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/f/freetype/2.13.1/22773b67079e4fc8a5c5e1f2b2afdc21/include/freetype2
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_image/2.8.2/c01cf87d24894a88aac65878822e7d05/include
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_image/2.8.2/c01cf87d24894a88aac65878822e7d05/include/SDL2
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_mixer/2.8.0/ed1f9447fe4b474ab2f002dd808016de/include
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_mixer/2.8.0/ed1f9447fe4b474ab2f002dd808016de/include/SDL2
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.90.4/eef0b2364c6b49f390dc29dfc946656c/include
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.90.4/eef0b2364c6b49f390dc29dfc946656c/include/imgui
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.90.4/eef0b2364c6b49f390dc29dfc946656c/include/backends
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.90.4/eef0b2364c6b49f390dc29dfc946656c/include/misc/cpp
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/4c3c72af70fd4599a3038fc662af9c28/include
)
target_compile_definitions(graphic PRIVATE
    _REENTRANT
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
    _DEFAULT_SOURCE
    _BSD_SOURCE
    HAS_FCHOWN
    HAS_STICKY_DIR_BIT
)
target_compile_options(graphic PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(graphic PRIVATE -W3)
else()
    target_compile_options(graphic PRIVATE -Wall)
endif()
set_target_properties(graphic PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(graphic PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET graphic PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(graphic PRIVATE
    SDL2
    SDL2_ttf
    freetype
    z
    SDL2_image
    SDL2_mixer
    imgui
    OpenGL
    glfw3
    Xrandr
    Xinerama
    Xcursor
    Xrender
    X11
    Xi
    Xfixes
    Xext
    xcb
    Xau
    Xdmcp
    graphic_files
    core
    dl
    pthread
)
target_link_directories(graphic PRIVATE
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_ttf/2.22.0/e680bcc475114feb9516a0bcb4973171/lib
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/f/freetype/2.13.1/22773b67079e4fc8a5c5e1f2b2afdc21/lib
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_image/2.8.2/c01cf87d24894a88aac65878822e7d05/lib
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/l/libsdl_mixer/2.8.0/ed1f9447fe4b474ab2f002dd808016de/lib
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.90.4/eef0b2364c6b49f390dc29dfc946656c/lib
    /home/xeon0x/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/4c3c72af70fd4599a3038fc662af9c28/lib
    build/linux/x86_64/release
)
target_link_options(graphic PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(graphic PRIVATE
    src/menu/Menu.cpp
)

add_library(graphic_files STATIC "")
set_target_properties(graphic_files PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "graphic_files")
set_target_properties(graphic_files PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(graphic_files PRIVATE
    src
    src/core
    src/core/rules
)

    /usr/include/SDL2

add_executable(test "")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "test")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin")
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    src
    src/core
    src/core/rules
)
target_compile_options(test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE -W3)
else()
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE -Wall)
endif()
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(test PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(test PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(test PRIVATE
    src/core/Piece.cpp
    src/core/Case.cpp
    src/core/Player.cpp
    src/core/testRegression.cpp
    src/core/Deck.cpp
    src/core/Game.cpp
    src/core/Card.cpp
    src/core/Grid.cpp
